shortDescription: The Registrations for the Events Calendar WordPress plugin before 2.7.5 does not escape the v parameter before outputting it back in an attribute, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
vulnerabilityName: roundupwp registrations_for_the_events_calendar Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
